duties_responsibilities.duty: Own quality for a 285 union employee site and manage a team of 22-25 to produce 1 million finished goods per year across several SKUs for all branches of the US military and NATO countries.
Use data to get to the root cause, achieving ISO9001 re-certification with 0 findings in November 2023.

education_certification.credential: BS (Math, Chemistry, Physics, Engineering highly preferred). Advanced degree (highly preferred). US Citizen or Permanent Resident (Green Card holder).
